pr_title: NIFI-7274 add time for test conditions to be met

timeline.message: NIFI-7274 add time for test conditions to be met

timeline.bodyText: Should there be a max number of sleeps so that this may not loop forever?  It may not happen now, but in the future it may be possible after a change right?
timeline.author: ottobackwards

replies.bodyText: any you can tell that is where you timed out?  ok.  just a knee jerk reaction to the pattern.
replies.author: ottobackwards
